We are a nerd-inspired, independently owned bar that serves a wide range of rotating, locally sourced craft beer conveniently located on Bloor between Dundas Street West and Keele Street at 1651 Bloor Street! Stop by and enjoy our huge back patio (until 11pm), pull up a stool at the bar, or challenge someone to a game on the PS4!

8+ Rotating Taps of Local Craft Beer!

PLUS we have a wide selection of local craft cider in cans and bottles and a wide assortment of liquors to quench your thirst!

Every Sunday at 10pm!
Release your favorite Jigglypuff and belt out your favorite tunes! No registration required, just show up, enjoy some craft beer and sing your heart out!


Every Other Tuesday at 6pm and 8pm!
To register, instructions are posted on our Facebook page at 4pm on the day of! While you're there, you might as well click that Like button as well!
